Actors: Zachary Levi, Mark Strong, Jack Dylan Grazer, Ross Butler
Writer: C.C. Beck (Captain Marvel/Shazam created by), Henry Gayden (screenplay), Darren Lemke (screenplay), Bill Parker (Captain Marvel/Shazam created by)
Plot: A boy is given the ability to become an adult superhero in times of need with a single magic word.
Title: Shazam!
